premise_source_doc_sentence: George Andrew Romero  (  -LSB- rə 'm ɛroʊ -RSB- born February 4 , 1940  )  is an American-Canadian filmmaker and editor , best known for his series of gruesome and satirical horror films about an imagined zombie apocalypse , beginning with Night of the Living Dead and notably continuing on with Dawn of the Dead and Day of the Dead .
